pages.title: Auto Stim Pack
pages.text: A portable automatic injection system, which monitors your health while present in your inventory, Curios slot or Bauble slot.$(br)When you are $(t:Default 3 hearts)low on health$(), it will charge up for about one second, and push a few hearts instantly back. Additional short regeneration and boost effects help you to get out of
$(br2) $(br2) $(br) the unfortunate situation:$(br) $(br)$(li)Regeneration: 15s$(li)Speed: 20s$(li)Resistance: 10s$(li)Fire Resistance: 10s$(br2)Has only two shots and is not repairable.
